text2.1: Learn slang and specific words from each region of Brazil whenever and wherever you want, having access whenever necessary through the chat.
text2.2: The chatbot performs the translation of the words informed from social networks, helping to understand in a comfortable way for the user.
text1.3: Learn language varieties in a fun way
text2.3: Learning the variation of the Portuguese language and having full understanding, ends up encouraging the student to use the app more and more.
